titles.title: District of Columbia Attorney General Appointment Reform Act of 2025
District of Columbia Attorney General Appointment Reform Act
District of Columbia Attorney General Appointment Reform Act of 2025
To amend the District of Columbia Home Rule Act to provide for the appointment of the Attorney General for the District of Columbia by the President, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Ordered to be Reported by the Yeas and Nays: 25 - 20.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform. H. Rept. 119-316.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 270.

committee.name: House Oversight and Government Reform
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents
